Hi {{contact_name}},
This is a reminder that the annual self-assessment report for {{community_name}} is now 1 month overdue.
As part of the Dementia-Friendly Communities recognition process you are required to complete an online self-assessment questionnaire to provide an update on the progress your community has made so far towards becoming dementia-friendly.
To complete the annual self-assessment questionnaire, please follow the link below to complete
{{survey_url}}
We look forward to hearing from you and do not hesitate to get in touch if you have any further questions.
Best wishes
The Dementia Friendly Communities Team
